content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
- Stone furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
- Stone furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
- Stone furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
- Stone furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
- Stone furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
- Stone furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
- Stone furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5) and two burner inserters at positions (x=3.5, y=0.5) and (x=0.5, y=3.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using set_research
- Ensure the research technology exists and the lab has the required items to start the research
### Errors when inserting items
- Make sure the item to be inserted exists in the inventory and the destination entity has enough space to hold the item
### Errors when using insert_item
- Ensure the item to be inserted exists in the inventory and the destination entity can hold the item
### Errors with offshore pump or boiler not working correctly
- Check the connections between the offshore pump and boiler, and ensure they are properly connected by pipes
### Errors with chest being full
- Ensure the chest has enough space to hold the items being inserted, or remove items from the chest to make space
### Errors with no input liquid or no fluid present in connections
- Check the connections between the steam engine and the boiler, and ensure the boiler has enough fuel and water to produce steam
### Errors with out of fuel
- Ensure the boiler has enough fuel to operate, or insert fuel into the boiler
